version_description:
● An Intervalometer function has been added - Perfect to capture your time-lapses
● A Sleep Timer option has been added to dramatically reduce energy consumption during long exposures
● The Zoom slider has been replaced by gestures - Simply pinch or pan vertically to zoom in/out

● We also did numerous behind-the-scenes modifications to improve app performance and robustness. If you ever find a bug, please let us know by using the 'Contact us' option in the app settings.

Here's another update for you!

- Option to share pictures from the edit view
- Picture aspect ratio including 1:1
- Sporadic crash fixes

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the ‘Rate or Review on App Store’ button in the app settings). Many thanks!!!

Here's another update for you!

- Apple Watch and Handoff support

- Added visual cue for Self-Timer
- Cosmetic tweaks to app icon and lower toolbar buttons

- Fixed alignment issue in Settings view
- Fixed crash when sharing on iOS 9.2

- Many behind the scene improvements

PLEASE NOTE that the Low Light capture mode now always uses full resolution. Other resolutions are too noisy for low light capture.

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the ‘Rate or Review on App Store’ button in the app settings). Many thanks!!!

Here's another update for you!

- Apple Watch and Handoff support

- Added visual cue for Self-Timer
- Cosmetic tweaks to app icon and lower toolbar buttons

- Fixed alignment issue in Settings view
- Fixed crash when sharing on iOS 9.2

- Many behind the scene improvements

PLEASE NOTE that the Low Light capture mode now always uses full resolution. Other resolutions are too noisy for low light capture.
- Chinese and Japanese languages support

- You can now manually adjust ISO (Yey!)
- Improved low light performance for all 3 capture modes

- New Noise Reduction setting
- New contextual tips: simply tap the blue button to display them (They may be disabled in Settings)
- Support for iPhone 7 Plus dual-camera

- Apple Watch shutter button fixed to update correctly (watchOS 3.0 now required)
- Exposure adjusts itself better in Low Light capture mode
- Exposure time is now accurately reported in Exif (It was sometime incorrect)

- Many other performance and stability improvements

P.S. Every time we release a new version, we lose all your ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the ‘Rate or Review on App Store’ button in the app settings). Many thanks!!!
iOS 11 support, fixes and improvements.

- iOS 11 support
- Performance and stability improvements
- More to come soon. Stay tuned!

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the "Rate or Review on App Store" button in the app settings). Many thanks!!!

- iOS 11 support
- Performance and stability improvements

- iPhone X support
- Performance and stability improvements

This released only fixes some minor issues but new features are coming soon!

- Fixes an issue where playing music could be muted
- Fixes an issue where some tips were shown more than once
- Fixes an issue where the Boost button was not displayed

- Adds minor stability improvements

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the ‘Rate on App Store’ button in the settings). Many thanks!!!

Sorry but nothing major in this release...

- Adds support for the HEIF file format (requires iOS 11).
- Fixes an issue where a modal alert could be shown twice.

More to come soon!

Sorry but nothing major in this release...

- Adds support for the HEIF file format (requires iOS 11 and compatible hardware*).
- Fixes an issue where a modal alert could be shown twice.

More to come soon!

* iPhone 7 or later, iPad (6th gen), iPad pro

- Adds camera grid (which can be enabled in Settings)
- Adds haptic feedback to sliders (on compatible devices)
- Smooths camera transitions
- Blurs the camera preview when the app enters background
- Reduces memory footprint

In order to support the addition of future features, some parts of the app have been reworked. If you find any new glitches, please let us know at support@cogitap.com. Thanks for your support!

- Shutter button now shows remaining capture time
- Stability improvements

More to come soon!

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the "Rate on App Store" button in the settings). Many thanks!!!
